parameters.name: AppName
parameters.description: The name of the application to which the live stream belongs.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description:
The recording end time. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the *yyyy-MM-dd*T*HH:mm:ss*Z format. The time must be in UTC.

>  The difference between EndTime and StartTime must be within 7 days. If the difference exceeds 7 days, ApsaraVideo Live considers 7 days as the difference. This parameter takes effect only on the live stream specified by the StreamName parameter. If the StreamName parameter is not specified, this parameter does not take effect.

parameters.name: OnDemand
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable on-demand recording. Valid values:

*   **0**: disables on-demand recording.
*   **1**: enables on-demand recording by using the HTTP callback method.
*   **2**: enables on-demand recording by parsing the stream ingest parameters.
*   **7**: By default, ApsaraVideo Live does not automatically record live streams. You can call the [RealTimeRecordCommand](~~85907~~) operation to manually start or stop recording.

>  If you set the OnDemand parameter to **1**, you must call the [AddLiveRecordNotifyConfig](~~51831~~) operation to configure the OnDemandUrl parameter. Otherwise, ApsaraVideo Live does not perform on-demand recording.

parameters.name: OssBucket
parameters.description:
The name of the OSS bucket.

To store live stream recordings in OSS, you must create an OSS bucket in advance. For more information, see [Configure OSS](~~84932~~).

parameters.name: OssEndpoint
parameters.description:
The endpoint of the Object Storage Service (OSS) bucket.

To store live stream recordings in OSS, you must create an OSS bucket in advance. For more information, see [Configure OSS](~~84932~~).

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description:
The recording start time. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the *yyyy-MM-dd*T*HH:mm:ss*Z format. The time must be in UTC.

>  The start time must be within 7 days after the stream ingest starts. This parameter takes effect only on the live stream specified by the StreamName parameter. If the StreamName parameter is not specified, this parameter does not take effect.

parameters.name: StreamName
parameters.description: The name of the live stream.
